hobbies.description: I have a deep appreciation for coffee, enjoying the process of brewing different types of coffee and exploring various brewing methods. I also like visiting local coffee shops to try new flavors and learn about coffee culture.

I am passionate about maintaining a healthy lifestyle through regular running and working out. I enjoy setting fitness goals, participating in local races, and exploring new workout routines to challenge myself physically.

I am an avid reader with a broad interest in various genres, including fiction, non-fiction, and technical literature. I enjoy immersing myself in different worlds and gaining new perspectives through books.

I have a fascination with mechanical keyboards, enjoying the process of customizing and building them. I appreciate the tactile feedback and unique typing experience they offer, and I often participate in online communities to share knowledge and ideas.

I am enthusiastic about learning new languages, enjoying the challenge of understanding different linguistic structures and cultures. This hobby enhances my communication skills and broadens my global perspective.

I have a strong interest in equities and derivatives trading, including stock options, futures, and forex. I enjoy analyzing market trends, developing trading strategies, and staying updated with financial news to make informed investment decisions.

research_interests.description: I want to research the development and implementation of algorithmic trading strategies using quantitative analysis. This includes studying financial models, risk management techniques, and the use of machine learning to predict market trends and optimize trading decisions.

My research interests in this area focus on the integration of artificial intelligence with robotics to enhance automation and decision-making processes. This involves exploring machine learning algorithms for robot perception, navigation, and manipulation, as well as human-robot interaction and collaborative robotics.

I aim to investigate the application of genetic algorithms for solving complex optimization problems. This includes studying their effectiveness in various domains such as machine learning, scheduling, and design optimization, as well as improving their performance through hybridization with other evolutionary algorithms.

My research in quantum computing focuses on exploring quantum algorithms and their potential to solve problems that are intractable for classical computers. This includes studying quantum error correction, quantum cryptography, and the application of quantum computing in fields such as material science, cryptography, and artificial intelligence.

I want to research advancements in natural language processing (NLP) and large language models (LLMs). This involves exploring techniques for improving language understanding, generation, and translation, as well as applications in information retrieval, sentiment analysis, and conversational AI.

My interests in generative AI include studying models and techniques for generating high-quality synthetic data, images, and text. This encompasses researching generative adversarial networks (GANs), variational autoencoders (VAEs), and their applications in creative fields such as art, music, and content creation.

responsibilities: Prepared and cooked menu items in accordance with recipes and quality standards.
Maintained cleanliness and organization of the kitchen and workstations.
Collaborated with kitchen staff to ensure timely and efficient service.
Adhered to food safety and sanitation guidelines.
Assisted in inventory management and restocking of supplies.
Oversaw kitchen operations and ensured high standards of food quality and presentation.
Supervised and trained new kitchen staff members.
Managed shift schedules and coordinated staff assignments.
Monitored inventory levels and placed orders for necessary supplies.
Maintained a clean and safe working environment, adhering to health and safety regulations.

experience.title: Team Member
responsibilities: Leveraged supervised learning techniques, including K-nearest Neighbors (KNN) regression, to predict consumables usage with remarkable accuracy, achieving a mean squared error (MSE) of 0 and an R-squared score (R2) of 1 on test data.

Applied unsupervised learning methodologies such as K-means clustering and hierarchical clustering to uncover hidden patterns in unlabeled data, providing valuable insights into consumables usage patterns and optimizing inventory management strategies.

Demonstrated strong data analysis and visualization skills by effectively communicating results through visual representations such as scatter plots and dendrograms, facilitating data-driven decision-making for future consumption predictions and resource planning.

experience.title: Cook / Shift Lead
responsibilities: Oversees daily operation, ensures service and food quality, implements health and safety standards, monitor inventory and ordering supplies.
Handles customers concerns and feedback, and mentors new employees.

projects.title: UCKG
responsibilities: Investigating UCKG's potential integration within intelligent cyber operations framework to enhance data analysis, threat detection, and response strategies.
Exploring how UCKG methodologies can be adapted to optimize cyber threat intelligence gathering, leveraging its principles for real-time risk assessment and mitigation.

Assessing the feasibility of incorporating UCKG principles into automated decision-making processes within cyber defense systems, aiming to enhance adaptability and resilience against evolving threats.

projects.title: Stock Predictor
responsibilities: Trained mathematical models to predict stock price trends using Naive Bayes, Neural Networks, and Linear Regression Time Series algorithms.
Scripted the predictive stock price model and obtained a prediction accuracy of 90.07%.
